# init(screenSize:label:)

**Initializer**

A convenience initializer that creates a rate map descriptor with a given size and identifier.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(screenSize: MTLSize, label: String? = nil)
```

## Parameters

- **screenSize**: The logical size, in pixels, of the viewport coordinate system.
- **label**: A string that identifies the resulting rate map.

## Return Value

A descriptor object whose [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateMapDescriptor/screenSize] and [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLRasterizationRateMapDescriptor/label] properties are set to the provided values. You need to add at least one layer rate map to the descriptor.

## Creating rate map descriptors

- **init(screenSize:layer:label:)**: A convenience initializer that creates a rate map descriptor with a single rate layer.
- **init(screenSize:layers:label:)**: A convenience initializer that creates a rate map descriptor with a set of layer descriptors.
